title: Luxury Ocean View Suite
roomDescription: Indulge in the ultimate luxury with our Ocean View Suite. This spacious and elegantly designed suite offers breathtaking views of the ocean. It features a separate living area, a king-sized bed, and a private balcony where you can enjoy the serenity of the sea. The suite is perfect for a romantic getaway. Relax and unwind in style.

title: Deluxe King Room
roomDescription: Our Deluxe King Room offers a comfortable and stylish stay. With a spacious 400 sq ft of room, it features a king-sized bed and modern amenities. Whether you're on a business trip or a leisure vacation, this room ensures a cozy and relaxing experience.

title: Executive Suite
roomDescription: Experience true elegance in our Executive Suite. With 600 sq ft of space, it offers a separate living area, a king-sized bed, and a private work desk. Enjoy the luxury of a spacious suite designed for comfort and productivity.

title: Family Suite with Balcony
roomDescription: Our Family Suite is perfect for a family vacation. The 550 sq ft suite features a king-sized bed, a separate living area with a sofa bed, and a private balcony. Enjoy quality family time in a spacious and comfortable setting.

title: Penthouse with Private Pool
roomDescription: Experience the pinnacle of luxury in our Penthouse. This 800 sq ft space offers a private pool, a king-sized bed, and a stunning view. Unwind in style and enjoy your own private retreat high above the city.

title: Classic Double Room
roomDescription: Our Classic Double Room is a cozy and affordable choice for your stay. With 300 sq ft of space, it features two comfortable double beds and all the essential amenities you need for a comfortable visit.
